__e: The sight, just the sight, of Xena, Warrior Princess, arguing on my behalf amuses me so...
The idea that Xena, the Warrior Princess..., ...could be captured and thrown in prison sure smells like a set-up to me.
In a time of ancient gods..., ...I was Xena, the Warrior Princess.
Ah, and Xena... The next time we meet, I'll be a god.
Xena, my wife's memory lives on in my heart.
So remember, Xena... Faith is not a jump in the night but a walk in the light.
Is there nothing that Xena can't do?
Well, nor would I choose it, Father. But this Xena's left me no alternative.
When you look at her now what you see is what she would have become if Xena had not killed her family.
But even I know that Xena's there.
Xena? It's been awhile, hasn't it?
Look... I know what Xena did to you is a terrible thing.
They've agreed to let me take Xena and my son away from here.
I mean, Xena and I..., ...we care about you, and... I mean, I know it's kind of hard to tell sometimes.
Take me, take Xena, and let the people go.
Xena told me never to turn my back on you.
Xena told me to report to you.
You know, the old Xena would have lopped my head off for a story like that.
